description: We're on a mission to accelerate the shift to clean transport, and in turn combat the air pollution crisis. jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
üöò About Zeti
 
At Zeti, we are on a mission to accelerate the shift to clean transport. We believe that transport is fast becoming a service, but traditional financing models aren‚Äôt cut out to deal with the transition.
 
We are building a FinTech platform to disrupt the commercial vehicle finance space. We‚Äôre connecting financiers with fleets, and pioneering a pay-as-you-drive model to make EVs more accessible than ever to businesses.

Following our incubation at Octopus Investments, we have already started generating revenue after financing ¬£10m of commercial EVs, and won industry awards including Innovative New Product of the Year at the Commercial Fleet Awards 2019. We are now preparing to rapidly scale our business, having identified a significant pipeline of opportunities.
 
üë§ The Role
 
To help us scale, we are now looking for a technology leader, capable of building the platform that will unleash the digital operating model that represents our biggest competitive advantage.
 
As CTO, you will:
- Set the technology vision of the company
- Own key technological and architectural decisions
- Attract and manage development teams
- Create the product and technical roadmap
- Lead the design and development of the platform
 
üîç Required Skills/Experience
 
1. Leadership
‚Ä¢ Built and led a technical team, and managed their welfare and professional development
‚Ä¢ Managed an agile development project before, with experience of scoping and setting timelines
‚Ä¢ Obsessive about customer-centricity, and constantly seeking to promote the optimum experience
‚Ä¢ Able to communicate the importance of automation and scalability
‚Ä¢ Comfortable explaining technical products and systems to unrelated and non-technical parties (e.g. fundraising)
 
2. Technical
‚Ä¢ Experience in building & scaling fintech businesses or similar services
‚Ä¢ Demonstrated track record of delivering well-engineered products/platforms with modern technologies for multiple user groups
‚Ä¢ Worked on a diverse set of full stack technologies including experience with web, mobile, data and infrastructure
‚Ä¢ Appetite for experimenting with large data sets, new technologies and tools to drive innovation and creativity
 
3. Product Focus
‚Ä¢ Proven delivery of a product to market, in a B2B context and ideally in B2C also
‚Ä¢ Engaged in the product development process in prior roles
‚Ä¢ Experience of knowing when to push for the perfect solution versus a simpler way to move product development forward
‚Ä¢ Interest in tracking how the software is being used and keep on top of key technical and user metrics
 
4. Nice-to-haves
‚Ä¢ Genuine interest, passion or experience in fintech and sustainability   
‚Ä¢ Motivated to join a startup as a founding member, comfortable with uncertainty and able to get the job done
‚Ä¢ Strong and established technical network and can leverage this network to accelerate platform development
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills
 
üèÖ Benefits
‚Ä¢ This is a unique opportunity to lead the technical growth of a startup with significant commercial interest
‚Ä¢ Flexible hours and annual leave
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and equity offering
 
üí¨ Interested? Or know someone who might be?
 
Please contact hr@zeti.co.uk for more information about the opportunity.
